user.speaker: user
user.text: I do not want to miss my garbage collection service again...especially during the holiday time

agent.speaker: agent
agent.text: Service hours are Monday - Friday from 7:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m. Regarding your concern about not missing the garbage collection service during the holiday season, there is no garbage, organics, or recycling collection on New Year's Day, Independence Day, Labor Day, Thanksgiving Day, and Christmas Day. During weeks when these holidays fall on a weekday, pickup is one day later for the rest of the week, including Saturday. LOJO Technology will also offer quarterly Saturday collection dates for those who cannot make it during the week. 2024 Saturday dates from 9 AM to 1 PM for electronic recycling. To set up an HHW appointment for Hazardous waste, please fill out the reservation form and enter your preferred date/time. Miller Environmental Group, Inc. is open Monday - Friday, 8 AM to 3 PM.

contexts.text:
FAQs - City of Piedmont

A. Latex and oil-based paint needs to be taken to an Alameda County Household Hazardous Waste Facility. Call (800) 606-6606 or visit http://www.StopWaste.org/recycling/residents/household-hazardous-waste/paints.

Q. What do I do with syringes and hypodermic needles?

A. They cannot be recycled or thrown in the garbage and must be disposed of properly. Please visit the Alameda County Household Hazardous Waste website or call (800) 606-6606 for proper disposal instructions.

Q. I have some unusual items to recycle. Where can I get more information about what to do with them?

A. Visit the web site of StopWaste.org. or call their toll-free hotline, (877) 786-7927.

Q. Who should I call about the disposal of household hazardous waste?

A. Call the Alameda County Household Hazardous Waste Program at (800) 606-6606.

Collection Day Information

Q. What are the hours of collection?

A. Service hours are Monday - Friday from 7:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m.

Q. What is my collection schedule during holidays?

A. There is no garbage, organics, or recycling collection on New Year's Day, Independence Day, Labor Day, Thanksgiving Day, and Christmas Day. During weeks when these holidays fall on a weekday, pickup is one day later for the rest of the week, including Saturday. For example, if your regular service day is Tuesday you will get service on Wednesday, or if your regular service day is Friday you will get service on Saturday. Garbage, recycling, and organics collection schedules are not affected by any other holidays.

Additional Service Questions

Q. Who do I call about missed collection of garbage/recycling/organics service?

A. Call Republic Services at their toll- free number, (800) 320-8077 before 12 noon for a return trip on the same day.

Q. I need a replacement cart because mine is damaged or missing. Who do I call?

ml.tokens.model_text: What are the hours of garbage collection?

contexts.text:
Household Hazardous Waste | Madison County, NY
For example, a gallon of bleach that only has 1/2 gallon left would be counted as 1 full gallon of material. Please leave materials in their original containers and do not consolidate with any other materials.Do not bring empty paint cans to the collection facility. They are garbage.STEP 2: Request an appointment. To set up an HHW appointment, please fill out the reservation form and enter your preferred date/time. Miller Environmental Group, Inc. is open Monday - Friday, 8 AM to 3 PM. If possible, Monday, Thursday & Friday drop-off appointments are preferred by the HHW facility but we will work to accommodate any weekday requests. In addition, Miller Environmental Group is now offering appointments on the first Saturday of every month from 8 AM to 12 PM: January 6, February 3, March 2, April 6, May 4, June 1, July 6, August 3, September 7, October 5, November 2, December 7Appointments will be given on a first-come, first-serve basis.There is a limit of one visit per household per year.Next-day appointments will not be allowed. We require a minimum of 48 hours (2 full business days) to notify the facility and confirm the appointment. Once confirmed, you will receive an email with your confirmed appointment date/time and directions to the facility.STEP 3: Bring your HHW to Miller Environmental Group in Syracuse during your designated appointment time! Examples of Items that are Considered Household Hazardous Wastes:Please note that due to the extensive nature of products created and sold, this is not an all-encompassing list and only provides an overview of some of the categories considered HHW. While many of these products may not pose an immediate threat by itself, it can cause larger issues, such as ignitability or reactivity, when mixed with other materials.

ml.tokens.model_text: What are the hours of garbage collection?

agent.original_text:
If your garbage, recycling, or organics collection is missed in the City of Piedmont, you should call Republic Services at their toll-free number, (800) 320-8077 before 12 noon for a return trip on the same day.
Regarding your concern about not missing the garbage collection service during the holiday season, there is no garbage, organics, or recycling collection on New Year's Day, Independence Day, Labor Day, Thanksgiving Day, and Christmas Day. During weeks when these holidays fall on a weekday, pickup is one day later for the rest of the week, including Saturday. You can check the specific collection schedule for your area on the City of Piedmont's website or contact Republic Services for more information.
It's also important to ensure that your garbage, recycling, and organics carts are placed in an accessible location for collection by 7:00 a.m. on your scheduled collection day. If you have any issues with your carts or need a replacement, you can contact Republic Services for assistance.
